heading: Today
text: Morning clouds giving way to sun south of the Adirondacks and I-89.  A few stray showers north ending, with some afternoon sun developing, last far northeast.  Highs in the 50s to low 60s.  Winds becoming south near 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Fair early, then clouds and showers spreading north through the Green Mountains into NH. Periods of clouds west.  Lows in the 40s, a few upper 30s northeast.  South winds near 10 mph.

heading: Wednesday
text: Morning showers east becoming scattered.  Any early sun west giving way to clouds and scattered showers, possibly a thunderstorm, then tapering off south with a little sun late.  Highs in the 50s north, low 60s south.  South winds increasing to 10 to 15 mph.
